#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 

int a[1111];

bool chck(int64 val,int n,int k){
	int64 ret=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		ret+=val/a[i];
		if(ret>=k)
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

int main(){
	int n,k,i;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	int64 lo=0,hgh=1e18,ans=-1;
	
	while(lo<=hgh){
		int64 mid=(lo+hgh)/2;
		if(chck(mid,n,k)){
			ans=mid;
			hgh=mid-1;
		}
		else{
			lo=mid+1;
		}
	}
	cout<<ans;
	return 0;
}
